entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:40 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -36.4°C

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 38 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 38 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 59 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 39.
